byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and JONATHAN GILBERT

abstract: Argentine president-elect Mauricio Macri recounts his transformation from business scion, to soccer executive to politician; expresses desire to bridge divisions with his political opponents even as he details plans to diverge sharply from their policies.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Macri links his kidnapping 24 years ago to an awakening that put him on a course that would lead him to politics via the world of soccer.

headline.main: Mauricio Macri Took Detour From Life as Scion to Argentine Presidency
headline.print_headline: Argentine President-Elect Detoured From a Well-Traveled Path

snippet: Mr. Macri links his kidnapping 24 years ago to an awakening that put him on a course that would lead him to politics via the world of soccer.
